summary: Contoso Wireless offers a wide range of phones, including the Contoso Edge, Contoso Max, and Contoso Pro. Payment options include cash, credit card, PayPal, and payment plans with 0% interest. Customers can also take advantage of discounts for buying multiple phones, signing up for monthly service plans, being a student, senior, or military personnel, free shipping on orders over $50, weekly deals with discounts up to 50%, and a loyalty program with points that can be redeemed for discounts or free products.
